name: school-management

scripts.dev:both: concurrently "npm run dev" "npm --prefix frontend run dev"
scripts.build:both: npm run build && npm --prefix frontend run build
scripts.start:both: concurrently "npm run start" "npm --prefix frontend run preview"

description: This is a [Next.js](https://nextjs.org) project bootstrapped with [`create-next-app`](https://nextjs.org/docs/app/api-reference/cli/create-next-app).
